name: TankTank (ArgyleSandpaperStudios)
description:
TANK TANK the endless wave tank shooter game Controls: WASD: to move your tank LeftMouse: to fire (there is a cooldown to firing) Mouse: to aim Enemies :

enemy tanks will hurt you, knock you back and stun you. if only a couple of enemies spawn they will require two hits.

enemy bullets will knock you back and stun you but won't cause damage. the slower an enemy tank is the more bullets it fires

enemy mines will hurt you but not cause knockback or stun you can clear these by shooting them. only fast enemy tanks will drop mines.

Story

Hello there, my name is GreenCyberNinja and I'm a software developer/ game developer. For the month of September 2022, I issued a challenge to myself to make 1 game a week. The catch is that it has to be made a randomly selected gameplay in a randomly selected game engine. This game was built in GameMaker studios and the gameplay is an endless shooter/ wave shooter type game. Let me know in the comments what you think of the game and you can catch me on twitch @https://www.twitch.tv/greencyberninjax  where I streamed the entire development of this game.

Thank you for playing!!
